xmvc:query.xmvc:sql: INSERT INTO entries ( created, modified, firstname, lastname, email, remote_addr ) VALUES ( NOW(), NOW(), ?, ?, ?, ? )

xmvc:schema.xmvc:sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `entries` ( `entryID` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `created` datetime default NULL, `modified` datetime default NULL, `firstname` varchar(255) default NULL, `lastname` varchar(255) default NULL, `email` varchar(255) default NULL, `remote_addr` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`entryID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
